scMINER: Single-Cell Mutual Information-based Network Engineering Ranger

scMINER is a systems biology analysis framework for high-throughput single cell RNA-seq data, implemented primarily in R and python. This package offers a combination of individual tools including but not limit to MICA (Mutual Information based Clustering analysis) and SJARACNe. The main purpose of this pipeline is to help identify subtypes, construct cell type specific networks, and identify hidden drivers.

Get started now View it on GitHub
